languages.text: {n}Вблизи Капеллан производит еще более внушительное впечатление — это высокий, мощный мужчина, на лице и руках которого видны многочисленные шрамы. Весь его вид словно рассказывает историю о многочисленных еретиках, повстречавших конец при встрече с адептом истинной веры.{/n}

{n}Up close, Chaplain leaves an even stronger impression — a tall, burly man, whose face and hands bear numerous scars. His entire visage seems to tell the story of many heretics who met their end upon their encounter with this adept of true faith.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вблизи Капеллан производит еще более внушительное впечатление — это высокий, мощный мужчина, на лице и руках которого видны многочисленные шрамы. Весь его вид словно рассказывает историю о многочисленных еретиках, повстречавших конец при встрече с адептом истинной веры.{/n}

{n}Up close, Chaplain leaves an even stronger impression — a tall, burly man, whose face and hands bear numerous scars. His entire visage seems to tell the story of many heretics who met their end upon their encounter with this adept of true faith.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你近距离观察这位牧师时，他给你留下了更加深刻的印象。这是个高大、魁梧的男人，脸上与手上布满了伤痕。他的整张脸似乎都在透露着一件事情：无数异端分子遇上了这位如假包换的神职人员，随后不得善终。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Up close, Chaplain leaves an even stronger impression — a tall, burly man, whose face and hands bear numerous scars. His entire visage seems to tell the story of many heretics who met their end upon their encounter with this adept of true faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你近距离观察这位牧师时，他给你留下了更加深刻的印象。这是个高大、魁梧的男人，脸上与手上布满了伤痕。他的整张脸似乎都在透露着一件事情：无数异端分子遇上了这位如假包换的神职人员，随后不得善终。{/n}

languages.text: {n}De cerca, Capellán da una impresión aún más fuerte: es un hombre alto y fornido con las manos y la cara recubiertas de cicatrices. Sus facciones parecen contar la historia de los muchos herejes que encontraron su fin a manos de este adepto de la auténtica fe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Up close, Chaplain leaves an even stronger impression — a tall, burly man, whose face and hands bear numerous scars. His entire visage seems to tell the story of many heretics who met their end upon their encounter with this adept of true faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}De cerca, Capellán da una impresión aún más fuerte: es un hombre alto y fornido con las manos y la cara recubiertas de cicatrices. Sus facciones parecen contar la historia de los muchos herejes que encontraron su fin a manos de este adepto de la auténtica fe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}近くで見ると、教戒官はより強い印象を与える――長身で屈強な男で、顔と手には無数の傷跡がある。彼の風貌自体が、この真の信仰者と出会ってこの世を去っていった多くの異端者たちの物語を語っているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Up close, Chaplain leaves an even stronger impression — a tall, burly man, whose face and hands bear numerous scars. His entire visage seems to tell the story of many heretics who met their end upon their encounter with this adept of true faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}近くで見ると、教戒官はより強い印象を与える――長身で屈強な男で、顔と手には無数の傷跡がある。彼の風貌自体が、この真の信仰者と出会ってこの世を去っていった多くの異端者たちの物語を語っているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aus der Nähe hinterlässt Ordenspriester einen noch stärkeren Eindruck – ein großer, kräftiger Mann, dessen Gesicht und Hände zahlreiche Narben aufweisen. Seine ganze Erscheinung scheint die Geschichte vieler Ketzer zu erzählen, die bei einer Begegnung mit diesem Adepten des wahren Glaubens ihr Ende gefunden haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Up close, Chaplain leaves an even stronger impression — a tall, burly man, whose face and hands bear numerous scars. His entire visage seems to tell the story of many heretics who met their end upon their encounter with this adept of true faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus der Nähe hinterlässt Ordenspriester einen noch stärkeren Eindruck – ein großer, kräftiger Mann, dessen Gesicht und Hände zahlreiche Narben aufweisen. Seine ganze Erscheinung scheint die Geschichte vieler Ketzer zu erzählen, die bei einer Begegnung mit diesem Adepten des wahren Glaubens ihr Ende gefunden haben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}De près, Chapelain est encore plus impressionnant. Grand, de forte carrure, couvert de cicatrices aussi bien sur les mains que sur le visage, tout en lui raconte l'histoire des nombreux hérétiques qui n'ont pas survécu à leur rencontre avec cet adepte dont la ferveur n'a d'égale que l'austérité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Up close, Chaplain leaves an even stronger impression — a tall, burly man, whose face and hands bear numerous scars. His entire visage seems to tell the story of many heretics who met their end upon their encounter with this adept of true faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}De près, Chapelain est encore plus impressionnant. Grand, de forte carrure, couvert de cicatrices aussi bien sur les mains que sur le visage, tout en lui raconte l'histoire des nombreux hérétiques qui n'ont pas survécu à leur rencontre avec cet adepte dont la ferveur n'a d'égale que l'austérité.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Papaz, yakından çok daha ürkütücü bir etki bırakıyor. Elleri ve yüzü onlarca yara iziyle kaplı, iri cüsseli, uzun bir adam. Çehresinden, bu iman timsali şahısla karşılaşma talihsizliğine düşen sayısız kâfirin acı sonunun hikâyesi okunuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Up close, Chaplain leaves an even stronger impression — a tall, burly man, whose face and hands bear numerous scars. His entire visage seems to tell the story of many heretics who met their end upon their encounter with this adept of true faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz, yakından çok daha göz korkutucu bir etki bırakıyor. Elleri ve yüzü yaralarla kaplı, iri cüsseli bir adam. Bu imanı tam şahsın ellerinden ölümün sıcak kollarına düşen sayısız kâfirin hikâyesi bakışlarından okunuyor.{/n}
